{ðŸ—“ events} The next [Share and Play Game Demos event is June 30th at Washington University, St Louis](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/300761567/)!
Come and share your game demo(s) and/or check out what other people are working on and give feedback!

{ðŸš€ launches} [BattleCakes](https://volcanobean.com/games/battlecakes/) by [Volcano Bean](https://volcanobean.com/) is [now available on Xbox](https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/battlecakes/9N52M5KD3TS9)! Watch the [Launch Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oTDkmyP-bnk)!

{ðŸ—“ events} July's DrinkUp has been scheduled for July 11th at [Dirty 20 Bar](https://www.dirty20bar.com/)! Come hang out with us! [RSVP On Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/301437937)
{!header} Ideally there is enough content to fill these up every other week, but there's not much to say today... Come to our events!
